system.description: Beginning at level 14, you learn the sneakiest ability of all: the ability to steal the spell knowledge of other wizards. When you see a spell being cast, you may make an Arcana check with a DC equal to 10 + the spell’s level. If you succeed and the spell appears on the Wizard, Sorcerer, and/or Warlock spell list, you hold the spell in your mind. You can write a spell kept in mind in this way into your spellbook as if you had another spellbook or spell scroll to copy from. You can only hold one spell in mind in this way at once, but you may release a held spell at any time, freeing the space for a different spell.
